title: Optimism in dire times: The buffering role of optimism in the relationship between food insecurity and mental health during the COVID-19 pandemic
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Shani Pitcho, Oren Heller, Yung Chun, Talia Meital Schwartz-Tayri, Michal Grinstein-Weiss
